name: Saryn
description: Toxicity is Saryn’s strength. Her serpentine powers deal heavy damage. For Saryn, venom is a virtue.

abilities.name: Spores
abilities.description: Inflict a target with a pox of <DT_CORROSIVE_COLOR>Corrosive spores. Spread spores to nearby enemies by destroying them or killing their host. The longer the Spore spreads, its damage will increase.

abilities.name: Molt
abilities.description: Shedding her skin like a snake, Saryn leaves a decoy behind to draw fire from enemies.

abilities.name: Toxic Lash
abilities.description: While active, attacks deal additional <DT_POISON_COLOR>Toxin Damage; this effect is doubled for Melee Strikes. Instantly burst spores when attacking afflicted enemies.

abilities.name: Miasma
abilities.description: Release a poisonous miasma that deals <DT_VIRAL_COLOR>Viral Damage to enemies in range. Foes afflicted by spores are more susceptible to the mist.

languages.description: Giftigkeit ist Saryns Stärke. Ihre schlangenartigen Kräfte teilen hohen Schaden aus. Für Saryn ist Gift eine Tugend.
languages.name: Saryn

languages.description: La toxicité est la force de Saryn. Ses pouvoirs serpentins infligent de lourds Dégâts. Pour Saryn, le venin est une vertu.
languages.name: Saryn

languages.description: La tossicità è la forza di Saryn. I suoi poteri serpentini infliggono danni elevati. Per Saryn, il veleno è una virtù.
languages.name: Saryn

languages.description: 독성이야말로 새린의 강점. 구불구불한 뱀과도 같은 그녀의 힘은 강력한 피해를 가합니다. 새린에게 있어, 맹독은 미덕과 같습니다.
languages.name: 새린

languages.description: La toxicidad es la fuerza de Saryn. Sus poderes serpentinos causan un gran daño. Para Saryn, el veneno es una virtud.
languages.name: Saryn

languages.description: 剧毒是 Saryn 的强项。她蛇一般的能力会造成巨大伤害。对 Saryn 来说，毒液是一种美德。
languages.name: Saryn

languages.description: Токсичность — сила Сарины. Её змеиные силы наносят большой урон. Для Сарины яд — это добродетель.
languages.name: Сарина

languages.description: 毒こそSarynの本領。毒を自在に操る彼女は敵をじわじわと苦しめる。
languages.name: Saryn

languages.description: Toksyczność jest atutem Saryn. Jej serpentynowe moce zadają ciężkie obrażenia. Jad jest jej cnotą.
languages.name: Saryn

languages.description: A toxicidade é a força da Saryn. Seus poderes serpentinos causam dano pesado. Para Saryn, o veneno é uma virtude.
languages.name: Saryn

languages.description: 劇毒是 Saryn 的強項。她毒蛇般的能力造成重大傷害。對 Saryn 來說，毒液是一種美德。
languages.name: Saryn

languages.description: Saryn มีจุดแข็งอยู่ที่พิษ พลังที่เป็นพิษนี้จะสร้างความเสียหายอย่างรุนแรง เพราะสำหรับ Saryn แล้ว สิ่งที่มีพิษคือความถูกต้องดีงาม
languages.name: Saryn

languages.description: Zehir, Saryn'in gücüdür. Toksin güçleri düşmanlara ağır hasar verir. Saryn için zehir bir erdemdir.
languages.name: Saryn

languages.description: Єство отрути, що проникає за найліпші обладунки. Зміїні сили Зарини сили завдають великої шкоди. Отрута для неї — доброчесність.
languages.name: Зарина
